references.paper_title: Detailed human avatars from monocular video
references.reason: This paper is foundational, as it addresses the problem of creating detailed 3D human avatars from monocular video, a key challenge tackled by the current paper.

references.paper_title: SMPL: a skinned multi-person linear model
references.reason: This paper introduces the SMPL model, which is a widely used parametric human body model that the current paper uses as a basis for generating geometric tokens.

references.paper_title: 3d gaussian splatting for real-time radiance field rendering
references.reason: This paper introduces 3D Gaussian Splatting, the representation used by the current paper for real-time rendering of human avatars.

references.paper_title: Dinov2: Learning robust visual features without supervision
references.reason: This paper introduces DINOv2, which is used in the current paper for extracting multi-scale features to improve facial detail recovery.

references.paper_title: Expressive body capture: 3d hands, face, and body from a single image
references.reason: This paper introduces the SMPL-X model, an extension of SMPL used in this work, which improves the ability to model fine facial details and expressiveness in 3D human reconstruction.
